equation.expression: ncut(C_1, C_2) = \frac{cut(C_1, C_2)}{assoc(C_1, C)} + \frac{cut(C_1, C_2)}{assoc(C_2, C)}
assoc(C_i, C) = \sum_{p \in C_i, q \in C} w_{pq}
